00001 #include "Sprite.h"
00002 #include "Animation.h"
00003 
00004 #include "../tinyxml/tinyxml.h"
00005 
00006 using namespace std;
00007 
00008 namespace jvgs
00009 {
00010     namespace game
00011     {
00012         void Sprite::loadData(TiXmlElement *element)
00013         {
00014             /* Loop through all animation elements, adding them. */
00015             TiXmlElement *child = element->FirstChildElement("animation");
00016             while(child) {
00017                 Animation *animation = new Animation(child);
00018                 addAnimation(animation);
00019                 child = child->NextSiblingElement("animation");
00020             }
00021         }
00022 
00023         Sprite::Sprite()
00024         {
00025             current = "standing";
00026         }
00027 
00028         Sprite::Sprite(TiXmlElement *element)
00029         {
00030             load(element);
00031             current = "standing";
00032         }
00033 
00034         Sprite::Sprite(const string &fileName)
00035         {
00036             load(fileName);
00037             current = "standing";
00038         }
00039 
00040         Sprite::~Sprite()
00041         {
00042             /* Clear all animations. */
00043             for(map<string, Animation*>::iterator iterator =
00044                     animations.begin(); iterator != animations.end();
00045                     iterator++) {
00046                 delete iterator->second;
00047             }
00048         }
00049 
00050         void Sprite::addAnimation(Animation *animation)
00051         {
00052             animations[animation->getId()] = animation;
00053         }
00054 
00055         void Sprite::setAnimation(const string &current)
00056         {
00057             map<string, Animation*>::iterator result =
00058                     animations.find(current);
00059             if(result != animations.end())
00060                 this->current = current;
00061         }
00062 
00063         void Sprite::update(float ms)
00064         {
00065             animations[current]->update(ms);
00066         }
00067 
00068         void Sprite::render()
00069         {
00070             animations[current]->render();
00071         }
00072     }
00073 }
